name: Retro Racing
description:
From the same developer behind the classic Amiga racers, Nitro (Psygnosis) and ATR (Team17).

Choose your car, then skid, slide, spin and drive around the track at break neck speed, collecting power-ups as you go. Master the perfect racing line, avoid other cars and cones, and speed your way to victory in this adrenaline pumping top-down racer for iPhone, iPod touch and iPad.

Just how fast can you go?

FEATURES

Universal App.
Awesome Gameplay.
Silky Smooth 60FPS Action.
Two Player Split-Screen Mode.
